revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Galar Mine |image = [[File:Galar Mine.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Galar Mine. |tokens = 1,320,000 |location = Between Galar Route 3 and Galar Route 4 }} '''Galar Mine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 20,767,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
